sfdt:project:info.description: Gets the Package information for this project from the target Org. Useful for getting tag information

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

sfdt:release:report.description: Generate some report info from a releasePlan.json definition. If you supply targetusername it checks the org if installed

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

releaseplan.name: releaseplan
releaseplan.description: supply the location of a valid releasePlan.json

sfdt:scratchorg:create.description: Create new scratch org, configures previous or preview and email developer credentials

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

adminemail.name: adminemail
adminemail.description: Email address to set as admin - otherwise derived from the devHub user email

numberofdays.name: numberofdays
numberofdays.description: number of days to keep the org (defaults to 5)

configpath.name: configpath
configpath.description: Scratch Org Definition file Path - defaults to ./config/scratch-org-config/project-scratch-def.json

adminemail.description: Email address to set as admin - otherwise derived from the devHub user email

numberofdays.description: number of days to keep the org (defaults to 5)

configpath.description: Scratch Org Definition file Path - defaults to ./config/scratch-org-config/project-scratch-def.json
